程序包 com.apusplay.sdk.pay
的使用

  • 使用com.apusplay.sdk.pay的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.apusplay.sdk  
    com.apusplay.sdk.pay  
  • com.apusplay.sdk使用的com.apusplay.sdk.pay中的类 
    类和说明
    Payable
    The basic payment interface.
    PayCallBack
    The call back for payment in async way.
    PayConfig
    The configuration information to initialize the payable instance.
  • com.apusplay.sdk.pay使用的com.apusplay.sdk.pay中的类 
    类和说明
    IabBroadcastReceiver.IabBroadcastListener
    Listener interface for received broadcast messages.
    IabPay.OnConsumeListener
    Callback that notifies when a consumption operation finishes.
    IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener
    Callback that notifies when a purchase is finished.
    IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener
    Listener that notifies when an inventory query operation completes.
    IabResult
    Represents the result of an in-app billing operation.
    Inventory
    A repository to hold SKUs and purchases.
    ObjHolder
    A generic object container.
    Payable
    The basic payment interface.
    PayCallBack
    The call back for payment in async way.
    PayCode
    Code definitions for payment module both in integer and string format.
    PayConfig
    The configuration information to initialize the payable instance.
    PayResult
    The payment result data structure
    Purchase
    Represents an in-app billing purchase Order.
    Sku
    Represents an in-app product SKU(Stock Keeping Unit).
    SkuHolder
    The Sku container class Developer please implment shis SkuHolder interface if you have your own Sku provider.
